section.p: lets you customize the view details in the respective list window.
If not all details of a list item, for example a folder, fit on one line in the list window, you should set priorities.
As an example, this window is explained for the details of documents in the Document List window.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The respective list window is already selected, for example a Document List window.

section.title: Calling sequence

section.title: Options and parameters

dlentry.dd:
This box displays all the view details available, for example, name, drive, dates.
Double-click those view details you want to be displayed in the Document List window.

This box displays the view details selected. The items are displayed from left to right in the same order you selected them from the Details list box.
To deselect an item, double-click the entry in the Selected box.
Click Clear to remove all items from the Selected box. You can then begin to define a new sequence of details.

section.p: When you have selected the desired details, click Change to activate the new setting.
Click Cancel at any time to leave the Change View Details window. No changes are made.

section.title: Results
section.p: The list window contains the selected details in the newly defined sequence. This setting remains active throughout the current session until you change it again.
To save the settings for future sessions, respond with Yes to the prompt Do you want to save the current workbench? when you leave . The current settings will then be used the next time you start .
